timeline.author: gunnarmorling

timeline.bodyText: Might add the @ThreadSafe marker here and elsewhere potentially? I feel we got bit lenient about using those lately.
timeline.author: gunnarmorling

timeline.bodyText: Maybe move all the metrics stuff in this connector into its own sub-package?
timeline.author: gunnarmorling
